text: The Mousauwal Compound was the headquarters of an unaligned military leader in Afghanistan, named Samoud Khan. Several of the detainees held in extrajudicial detention in the Guantanamo Bay detainment camps, in Cuba. [ Summarized transcripts (.pdf)], from Mohabet Khan's Combatant Status Review Tribunal - pages 14-24 American intelligence analysts believed that Samoud Khan's forces were behind a rocket attack on the American's Firebase Gardez. ==References== Category:Military history of Afghanistan
title: Mousauwal Compound
